Subject: Re: Decepticon Conflict
References: <3B65856A.1137.1014125E@localhost>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Spinister reapeared, without noise, a few feet behind one of Megatrons
decepticons he assumed. He held up Singe and Hairsplitter, aiming both
futuristic weapons at Autofire. He then began to whisper instead of
firring, just loud enough for the Decepticon bounty hunter to hear. " A
Decepticon slaughter is hardly benificial to either team." he said, then
clicked his weapons, which both began to hum with energy to show they
were charged. "Let us retreat, and no harm will come to your or you
comerades..." he then whispered the last part to quietly for anyone to
hear. "Yet."
